title: Deep Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Generative AI Application Strategies for Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical education theory and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can generate and transform at least three types of mathematical problems using generative AI tools
Learners can create a 5-minute microlearning video explaining elementary math concepts (e.g., fractions) using AI-generated visual materials
Learners can propose at least two strategies for providing learner-level customized problems in AI-supported instructional design
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
